personalInfo.clubAffl: Belfair Plantation (Hilton Head Island, South Carolina)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditionally Exempt / 74th qualifier from Qualifying Tournament, Money List 61-100
tourBios.carHigh: Has never played in a Web.com Tour event. 2011: Qualified for the 2011 U.S. Open at Congressional CC, where he missed the cut. 2010: By virtue of his U.S. Amateur Public Links Championship, earned a berth in the Masters but wound up missing the cut...Also played in the John Deere Classic as an amateur (missed cut).
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Two-time Conference USA Scholar Athlete of the Year...Winner of the 2007 Palisades Intercollegiate...Defeated top-seeded Nick Taylor, 7 and 6, to win the 2009 U.S. Amateur Public Links Championship. Joined Ralph Howe III (1988) in becoming only the second lefthander to win the title. Earned a berth in the 2010 Masters Tournament and wound up missing the cut.
tourBios.personal: Plays lefthanded and putts righthanded...Attended Guilford HS in Rockford, IL...Lists Todd Bekmann and Todd Anderson among his instructors...Says playing in the 2010 Masters as U.S. Amateur Public Links champion is his biggest thrill in golf...Says Augusta National and Southern Hills CC are his favorite courses to play and would like to play Pebble Beach someday...Always puts three tees in his pocket when he plays...Never travels without his laptop computer...Favorite teams include the University of Memphis Tigers, the Chicago Bulls and the Chicago Cubs...Favorite TVv show is "East Bound and Down," and his favorite movies are "Billy Madison" and "Dumb and Dumber."...Favorite entertainer is Will Ferrell, and his favorite athlete to watch is Tiger Woods...Would include his father, Arnold Palmer and Phil Mickelson to round out his dream foursome...Bucket list includes playing on the PGA TOUR and winning a major championship.
